name: nextjs-server-http-debug-demo
description: Demo: Debugging server-side HTTP calls in Next.js with a proxy

scripts.dev:proxy: NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--require ./scripts/proxy-preload.cjs" HTTP_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:8080 HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:8080 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 next dev
